texto: 3 Terms and definitions For the purposes of this document, the terms and definitions given in ISO 3534-1, ISO 3534-2, ISO 3534-3, ISO 3534-4, ISO 9000:2015 and the following apply. ISO and IEC maintain terminological databases for use in standardization at the following addresses: — ISO Online browsing platform: available at https://​w ww​.iso​.org/​obp — IEC Electropedia: available at http://​w ww​.electropedia​.org/​
